Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at California. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier debris on the tracks at California.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
